explains: v. 承认；认可； 跟……打招呼，理会；告知收到；（公开）感谢

sentences.en: She refuses to acknowledge the need for reform.
sentences.cn: 她拒不承认改革的必要性。

sentences.en: I did not acknowledge that he had done anything wrong.
sentences.cn: 我没有承认他犯了什么错。

sentences.en: You have to acknowledge that we live in a racist society.
sentences.cn: 你不得不承认我们生活在一个有种族歧视的社会。
